SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures

Interface StructureAnimationRequest.IFactory

Enclosing class:
StructureAnimationRequest
@AssistedFactory public static interface StructureAnimationRequest.IFactory
The factory class for StructureAnimationRequest instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StructureAnimationRequest
    create(StructureRetriever structureRetriever, StructureActionCause cause, IMessageable messageReceiver, @Nullable IPlayer responsible, @Nullable Double time, boolean skipAnimation, boolean preventPerpetualMovement, StructureActionType actionType, AnimationType animationType)
    Creates a new StructureAnimationRequest.

  • Method Details

    • create

      StructureAnimationRequest create(StructureRetriever structureRetriever, StructureActionCause cause, IMessageable messageReceiver, @Nullable @Nullable IPlayer responsible, @Nullable @Nullable Double time, @Assisted("skipAnimation") boolean skipAnimation, @Assisted("preventPerpetualMovement") boolean preventPerpetualMovement, StructureActionType actionType, AnimationType animationType)
      Creates a new StructureAnimationRequest.

      Once created, use StructureAnimationRequest.execute() to submit the request.

      Parameters:
      structureRetriever - A retriever for the structure for which this toggle request will be created.

      Note that the retriever may only specify a single structure. See StructureRetriever.getStructure().

      cause - The cause of the movement.
      messageReceiver - The receiver for all messages related to the toggle. When no player is available, this should usually be the server (See IAnimatedArchitecturePlatform.getServer()) or IMessageable.BlackHoleMessageable.
      responsible - The player responsible for the movement.
      time - The duration of the animation in seconds. May be null to use the default time.
      skipAnimation - True to skip the animation and move the blocks to their new locations immediately.
      preventPerpetualMovement - True to prevent perpetual movement. When perpetual movement is requested but denied via this setting, the animation will still be time-limited.
      actionType - The type of movement to apply.
      animationType - The type of animation to apply.
      Returns:
      The new AnimationRequestData.
